question: National Cancer Awareness Day is observed on which date all over the India?
explanation: National Cancer Awareness Day is observed on 7 November. The main aim is to spread awareness about cancer and to make it global health priority. In 2014, National Cancer Awareness Day was started Indian Government. In India, nearly 1.1 million new cases are being reported annually. National Cancer Control Programme was initiated in 1975 with a view to provide the cancer treatment facilities in the country. The programme was modified in 1984-85 to provide thrust to prevention and early detection of cancer.
